channel.title: Npc drops[PI]
channel.description:
I have tried adding drops to Nomad but he doesn't drop them. I've added stuff to NPCdrops.cfg and NPCdrops.tsm but he doesn't drop the things I've added.
Here's what I put in NPCdrops.tsm:
[code]#Nomad 14641:1 14642:1 14484:1 19784:1 995:10000000 4151:1 15441:1 15442:1 15443:1 15444:1 15332:2[/code]
And here's my code I put in NPCdrops.cfg:
[code]8528 14641 14641 14641 14642 14642 14642 14484 19784 4151 4151 4151 4151 4151 15441 15442 15443 15444 15441 15442 15443 15444 15441 15442 15443 15444 15441 15442 15443 15444 15332 15332 15332 15332 15332 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995[/code]
I'm made him drop bones 100% in NPCconstant.cfg and they work.
Can someone please help me?
